channel.title: News on Ecology Games
channel.description: Recent content in News on Ecology Games

item.title: Master Thesis Evaluating BioInvasions: Raccoon Rampage
item.description: Pamela Neff’s Master’s thesis explores the effectiveness of “BioInvasions: Raccoon Rampage”, a board game designed to educate players about the complexities of managing invasive species, specifically raccoons in Europe.

item.title: Ecology Games
item.description:
We’ve been working on a number of ecology games. On this site you can find out more about them.

New and exciting projects are being worked on and will be added soon.
